name: Nenu Tech Limited
tagline: Developing apps for startups and enterprise
description:
Nenu Tech is a mobile app development company with offices in London and Houston. We have been developing highly engaging mobile apps since 2010. Our mobile app developers build apps for iPad, iPhone and Android.
We not only develop mobile apps but our app development team can design beautiful and usable mobile interfaces, architect complex web services and also help the companies in marketing their products.
We treat each project with the same passion and enthusiasm as if they were our own projects. We work with companies in understanding their users and goals for a mobile app and help in developing a clear strategy for maximizing the impact of mobile app.
